DOC.brief_summary: This study examine onset pain relief two different method labor epidural . The traditional labor epidural involve placement numb anti-pain medicine epidural space surround spinal cord . In order take effect , medication cross layer tissue call dura . In current study , medication place epidural space dura puncture fine needle . This research , help evaluate whether technique result earlier onset pain relief .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Dural Puncture Epidural Versus Traditional Lumbar Epidural Onset Labor Analgesia
